name: Quest - Figma to HTML Page
description:
Convert Figma to HTML with flex & true responsive behavior across screen sizes and custom breakpoints. Launch multi-page websites instantly with no code. Or export the cleanest code of any Figma plugin (HTML, CSS & JS).


Add interactions, animations, parallax effects easily. Build custom slideshows without writing any code. Publish to a sandbox and share with your team or client. Or add a custom domain with completely free SSL and launch instantly.


Want to update your page after launch? It's as easy as re-exporting your Figma file, and boom! You have a new live webpage. 


To get started:

  1. Install this plugin
  2. Login to your Quest account
  3. Select one or more frames for a page and click Export
  4. Convert Figma to HTML and host your site or export the code


Learn more at https://quest.ai/figma
